en.lectionNotCompleted: Are you ready to kick off from where you stopped?
en.lectionNotPassed: Are you ready to continue with your test?
en.lectionPassed: Are you ready to continue with the next lesson?
en.lectionDefaultSuggestedAnswer: Yes, I am ready to continue
en.chatGreetingMsg01: Welcome to Olympic Karate! I'm your Sansei and I'm thrilled to have you on board. If you're new to Karate, don't sweat it. I'll guide you through the basics.
en.chatGreetingMsg02: After each lesson I’ll test your knowledge and if you pass, you’ll move on to the next lesson.
en.chatGreetingMsg03: If you don’t pass, don’t fret! We’ll review the lesson again until you master it. Let’s get started?
en.chatGreetingPositiveAnswer01: I’m going to get you started by learning some nice and simple exercises and stretches to get your mind warmed up and prepared for some truly challenging Karate techniques later on.
en.chatGreetingPositiveAnswer02: I’m ready whenever you are and I’ll be with you the whole way through. Let’s go!
en.redirectCurrentMessage: Great try! Let’s go back and try it again.
